name: Nureha
ability: 【CONT】 When this card is in the stage, this card's card name is also regarded as "Dariella(ダリエラ)".
【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other characters get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500.
【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's encore step, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavor_text: I will do anything for Shiro.

name: Perfect Synchronization, Isuzu
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Reaching Through Song, Isuzu
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
【AUTO】 When this card direct attacks, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: We're going to pick a fight with the gods who only created 42 songs for this world!

name: Beautiful Idol Girl? Tetora
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavor_text: I’m a star shining in the night sky! An orthodox babe, I’m the galaxy-style starlet, Tetora!

name: Akatsuki
ability: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【CONT】 If you have 3 or more other 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters, this card gets +1500 power.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters you have.
flavor_text: That kind of overwhelming strength... is far more fragile than my weakness!

name: Disciple of Shiroe, Minori
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Just like Shiroe, I want to be able to carve out new paths!

name: "Dual Wield" Nyan-ta
ability: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power.
flavor_text: Why are you trying to instigate a war?

name: William Massachusetts
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if "The Resolve of Gamers" is in your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavor_text: Hurry! Shiroe’s team will charge the enemy!

name: "Full Raid" Shiroe
ability: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》, this card gets +1000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if you have 1 or less other 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters, put this card into your clock.
flavor_text: Right, I will return to the others!

name: The Resolve of Gamers
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: We spent our time on Elder Tales. A whole stinking lot of time.

name: Martial Artist, Kanami
ability: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Shiroe(シロエ)" in its card name, this card gets +1000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]".
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 3 or more other 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Sweet, sweet! I struck it rich with adventure! Let's go, Frognardo!
